quote: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world. – Eckhart Tolle
fact: The scene where Indiana Jones shoots the swordsman in Raider’s of the Lost Ark was Harrison Ford's idea so that he could take a bathroom break.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Whenever the cashier at the grocery store asks my dad if he would like the milk in a bag he replies, ‘No, just leave it in the carton!’
